bug.author: tomasmcz
bug.summary: update documentation and helper scripts to TF 0.9
bug.description: This should have been done in the tf9 branch before the merge.

comments.comment: Should we also add TF to requirements.txt?
i think requirements file is passed to pip, so no..
The problem with TF would be that we don't know whether the user wants the CPU or GPU version.
The code works with both versions and we should keep it that way.
prepare_env.sh updated in the py35 branch.

It should have been updated in master and py35 should have been rebased (which will need to happen anyway). If we now decide to abandon the py35 branch, this issue would be closed and the change would be lost.
